column3: â€œFor me, this strain is more on the milder side, and definitely a great example of what you want in a sativa med.  Creative, focused, and stressfree is the best way to describe this strain.  Simply put: with this strain I know I am in an anxious situation, I just can't get anxious about it.  Great medication for daytime/work/productive day.â€
â€œWonderful strain.  Erases anxiety an puts a smile on your face.  Perfect for mid morning/early afternoon.â€

â€œThis stuff is pretty good I got a small sample and it gets me there. Nice structure on these flowers big dense cluster of beautiful greens, oranges and reds even a goldish tint in some places. â€œThis is my new favorite strain. It has everything you need, and it packs a powerful punch within a few puffs.â€

â€œthis is one of the best sativas I've smoked. It's very relaxing hiwever I'm still energetic enough to carry on throughout my day. I do find the crash is pretty strong and very similar to when I've smoked an indica strain. but the effects of Pineapple Jack are well worth it!â€

column5: cloudy thoughts into a nice sort of peaceful calm. Gotta do laundry? Cool. Doing dishes next? Ok. That sociology paper with tonight's deadline? I'm on it. Puts you in a really great place and I highly recommend it. Try it if you run across it.â€"

column3: â€œOne of the best sativas that I've smoked. An all-around great daytime strain with an incredibly Unforgettable Aroma and taste like he's never had before.  I will never disappointed everytime I smoke this whether it was one to two hits or one to two bowls it has a very prominent uplifting effect on me.  Its effects are very noticeable but not overwhelming which makes it perfect for daytime smoke.â€

â€œI have mixed feelings about this strain. For me, it was a major creeper, so the first time I tried it I had a little too much and had a minor freak out. Not a paranoia freak-out, more of an anti-social kinda thing. The next few times were a lot better. It makes everything pop a little louder. Colors are more vibrant, every thought is an epiphany, and everything has a lot more emotional intensity. Very float-y. I also...â€

â€œWhat do I think about this strain?
The Strain it's very Piney taste taste and sweetness taste I can smell the pineapple when I blow it out this is a good strain I love this strain very relaxing very motivated to and also I have ADHD so helps me a lotâ€
